snippet: Energy Secretary Bill Richardson today added a week to his order requiring Western power suppliers to sell electricity to California and said he supported a regional cap on wholesale electricity prices.    Mr. Richardson told five Western governor...
lead_paragraph: Energy Secretary Bill Richardson today added a week to his order requiring Western power suppliers to sell electricity to California and said he supported a regional cap on wholesale electricity prices. Mr. Richardson told five Western governors that he supported the cap as a solution to shortages in California that have tripled prices for consumers.
abstract: Energy Sec Bill Richardson adds a week to his order requiring Western power suppliers to sell electricity to California and says he supports a regional cap on wholesale electricity prices (S)

headline.main: National News Briefs; Secretary Backs Cap On Western Power Prices
